Question 1
  Found [even] with compatible type.
  Failure: [even] is incorrect.
    When applied to the following argument:
    
     | [0; 1]
    it produces the following invalid result:
    [[0; 1]] A valid result is:
    
     | [0]
  Found [odd] with compatible type.
  Failure: [odd] is incorrect.
    When applied to the following argument:
    
     | [0; 1; 2]
    it produces the following invalid result:
    [[1; 2]] A valid result is:
    
     | [1]
Question 2
  Failure: Cannot find  [merge]
Question 3
  Failure: Cannot find  [sort]
Question 4
  Failure: Cannot find  [uniq]
Question 5
  Failure: Cannot find  [weed]
